scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.check: npm run client:check && npm run server:check
scripts.format: npm run client:format && npm run server:format
scripts.client:check: cd client && npm run check && prettier --check "**/*.{js,jsx}"
scripts.server:check: cd server && npm run check && prettier --check "**/*.ts"
